mapper.select: select com_num,com_name, com_add, com_phone, com_aff from temp_com where com_name = #{com_name}
select * from complete_com where com_name like %#{com_name}%
mapper.insert: insert into temp_com(com_num, com_name, com_add, com_phone, com_aff) values(0-(temp_com_num.NEXTVAL), #{com_name}, #{com_add}, #{com_phone}, #{com_aff})
mapper.update: update members set com_num = #{com_num}, com_name = #{com_name}, com_dept_name = #{com_dept_name}, com_dept_num = #{com_dept_num}, com_pos_name = #{com_pos_name}, com_pos_num = #{com_pos_num} where email = #{email}
